directions: Combine ricotta, cocoa powder, honey, and almond extract in a bowl. Mix with electric hand mixer or whisk until thoroughly blended, about 2 minutes. Transfer mixture to a serving bowl. Top with mini chocolate chips and almonds.
Serve with Snack Factory(R) Original Pretzel Crisps(R).
ingredients: 1 (7.2 ounce) package Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
title: Chocolate Almond Ricotta Dip
